attributes.action: Void any government petition calling for a second referendum
attributes.additional_details: Also, the result of the referendum will not be binding unless Elizabeth Hurley agrees to wrestle me naked in a paddling pool full of strawberry flavoured Jelly. Sorry, but thems the rules...
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call on the government to null & void any government petition unless all signees agree to vote wearing tutus & suspenders. Furthermore, whilst voting, they must repeatedly sing the lyrics to Air supply's 'I'm all out of love'. If they don't know the lyrics, its tough.
